name: @saekitominaga/document-maximum-zindex
description: Get the maximum value of z-index in the Document.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentZindex.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/DocumentZindex.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentZindex.mjs -- terser dist/DocumentZindex.mjs -o dist/DocumentZindex.min.mjs -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=DocumentZindex.min.mjs,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentZindex.min.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/DocumentZindex.min.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:dts-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentZindex.mjs.d.ts -- cpy dist/DocumentZindex.mjs.d.ts dist --rename=DocumentZindex.min.mjs.d.ts

author: Saeki Tominaga
